fact1002.value: NNIT is a leading provider of digital transformation services and solutions to international life sciences companies and for the Danish private and public sector.

fact1059.value: The Life sciences business unit delivers to both the Novo Nordisk Group and other life sciences clients in Den- mark as well as internationally.

fact1061.value: NNIT A/S is controlled by Novo Holdings A/S, of which the Novo Nordisk Foundation is the ultimate owner.
